english.segment1: How can I explain when you just don't get it?. I'll take half a grapefruit and tea. Why should I explain when you just won't see it?. Nothing here but jack 'o' lantern dreams
english.segment2: Remember through the darkness that we waltz on a knife. For the union of disunion and fight. The contagious in their cages and the rest of us dodging the curse. When the answers to these cancers is far worse
english.segment3: How can I explain when you just don't get it?. I'll take half a grapefruit and tea. Why should I explain when you just won't see it?. Nothing here but jack 'o' lantern dreams
english.segment4: Only if you can remember the ending. Can we then work back toward the start
english.segment5: How can I explain when you just don't get it?. Hold on to the mouse you set free. Why should I explain when you just won't see it?. Nothing here but jack 'o' lantern dreams
english.segment6: Nothing here but jack 'o' lantern dreams
english.segment7: Nothing here but Jack and his dreams
